SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.service

Interface ShowService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShowServiceImpl
public interface ShowService
Service interface defining operations related to movie shows. Handles creation and retrieval of shows based on different criteria.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Show
    createShow(ShowRequest showRequest)
    Creates a new show based on the provided show details.
    List<ShowResponse>
    getAllShowByMovieAndCity(String movieName, String cityName)
    Retrieves a list of shows for a given movie and city.
    List<ShowResponse>
    getAllShowsByMovie(String movieName)
    Retrieves a list of shows for a given movie.
    ShowResponse
    getShowByShowId(String showId)
    Retrieves a specific show based on the show ID.

  • Method Details

    • createShow

      Show createShow(ShowRequest showRequest)
      Creates a new show based on the provided show details.
      Parameters:
      showRequest - The request containing details to create a show.
      Returns:
      The created show.

    • getAllShowsByMovie

      List<ShowResponse> getAllShowsByMovie(String movieName)
      Retrieves a list of shows for a given movie.
      Parameters:
      movieName - The name of the movie to retrieve shows for.
      Returns:
      A list of show responses for the provided movie name.

    • getAllShowByMovieAndCity

      List<ShowResponse> getAllShowByMovieAndCity(String movieName, String cityName)
      Retrieves a list of shows for a given movie and city.
      Parameters:
      movieName - The name of the movie to retrieve shows for.
      cityName - The name of the city where shows are being searched.
      Returns:
      A list of show responses for the provided movie name and city name.

    • getShowByShowId

      ShowResponse getShowByShowId(String showId)
      Retrieves a specific show based on the show ID.
      Parameters:
      showId - The ID of the show to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The show response corresponding to the provided show ID.
